item.title: How to Teach Yourself a Foreign Language
item.description: My ebook, How to Teach Yourself a Foreign Language is available now for free online. You can one-click download from GitHub with this link. You can find the GitHub repository here if you want to check the file first. Support If you would like to offer a monetary donation or elect to receive email updates when a new version is released, you can find the book on Leanpub. Access the ebook on Leanpub here
